summary: Öllers and Niederländer have everything under control. For the past six years, the two successful business consultants have been traveling through some of the seediest countries around the world in order to satisfy their clients' greed.
cast: Sebastian Blomberg|Devid Striesow|Katharina Schüttler|Romesh Ranganathan|Steve Ellery|Jaymes Butler|Veronica Naujoks|Warsama Guled|Florence Kasumba|Joana Adu-Gyamfi|Christian Kupfer|Carlos Lobo
title: Zeit der Kannibalen
